metadata.Title: CVE-2011-2764 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: The FS_CheckFilenameIsNotExecutable function in qcommon/files.c in the ioQuake3 engine 1.36 and earlier, as used in World of Padman, Smokin' Guns, OpenArena, Tremulous, and ioUrbanTerror, does not properly determine dangerous file extensions, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted third-party addon that creates a Trojan horse DLL file.

criterions.comment: openarena package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
